metadata.title: CVE-2022-43680 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In libexpat through 2.4.9, there is a use-after free caused by overeagerdestruction of a shared DTD in XML_ExternalEntityParserCreate inout-of-memory situations.

criterions.comment: expat: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
